name: BoxBit
description:
Can you escape the White room with 2 players? About The Game

You control 2 players with the same controller means one jumps the other one too and so on and it will cause you some trouble on the levels but you have to figure out some tricks to go around.

the game has a lot of features that will help you through the journey which some may require you to use both players or only one. Throughout the game, you will have some abilities that won't be with you on all levels. *it might get frustrating when you can't finish it so I kept it easy for now. *if you are stuck just look for clues like what is different there than other levels. Keybinds -WD to MOVE -SPACE TO JUMP
 Heres a small preview:

i will soon post a full gameplay

Install instructions

-Extract the zip file and open exe file

Note: I am still working on the game there are only 6 levels for now 10 planned but I might add more this game is not polished because I am just learning game development so if you wanna support my hobby by playing this game then that would be nice :)
